title: Zyra, Darkin? (Varus' Sister)
body:
This is quite stupid xD
Zyra has a pretty similar history with the darkins. Her kind was thrieving and powerful, same as the darkins. Zyra's kind was also at the peek of extinction and had to adapt to a new life to survive (half human). Zyra also has pretty similar body features as varus, but instead of corruption, she has leaves/vines since she has full control of her body
